verses.text: Thou, the true and living Way, All who come to God by thee, Are securely happy; they Have what others cannot see.
Hidden manna they receive, They the living water taste; In thy life, as thou dost live, They are rooted, built, and placed.
When at first thou dost appear, They their comfort in thy grace; Found before, when thou wast there, Now they know their dwelling place.
Closer still to thee they move, Through thy Spirit they are led; And still more by faith they prove All that thou hast suffered.
Comfort still their hearts possess, God shall all their wants supply; And still more they shall express Christ with them shall never die.
